snippet: The boys, ages 9 to 14, were apparently the victims of fishermen who fired a rocket into a river in Baghlan Province, intending to stun or kill the fish.
lead_paragraph: The boys, ages 9 to 14, were apparently the victims of fishermen who fired a rocket into a river in Baghlan Province, intending to stun or kill the fish.

headline.main: 6 Boys Killed While Swimming in Northern Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: 6 Boys Killed While Swimming in Northern Afghanistan
